Kudos to @TSA who redesigned their PreCheck renewal process to be an absolute breeze! Such an improved #customerexperience & took me only a few minutes, #VoC survey included.

A special shout-out to my colleague, partner-in-crime and the reason I'm still partially sane @murphyjfraser on being named a @CallCenterICMI Top 25 #CCTR #CX Thought Leader! I thank my lucky stars I get access to your #thoughtleadership every day!

"Insanity is doing the same thing and expecting a different result." What a terrible #customerexperience  (not to mention horrible #customerretention strategy). @jbrowder1, the my question to you is would you ever do business with them again after this tactic? #CX
THIS! A community is a much better target. Community also incorporates a component of mutual respect and accountability vs. the sometimes implied obligation associated to family.
Amen, @CustomerIsFirst! I think this derives from authentic leadership. If I'm authentic & my true self, they can be authentic & their true selves! #leadership

It's not too late to register! Join @CallCenterICMI , Janelle Dieken of @Genesys, & myself tomorrow for a fruitful conversation on the state of #EX & #CX, and what we expect to see in the coming new year! https://t.co/l5dqFDjouM #customerexperience #employeeexperience

To my core, I believe that great #customerexperience starts in the #contactcenter & with #employeeexperience! What better way to celebrate #cxday2021 than an actionable read from one of the best #workforcemanagement experts I know, Jessica Musard! https://t.co/ZXoZIa78r0 @avtex
Always a fantastic day when I get to catch up with @CustomerIsFirst! Thanks for the great chat, Nate!

Very excited to share that we're still growing the strategic consulting team at @avtex and I'm hiring again! Know someone with a #ContactCenter, #WFM & #CX background that would be interested? I'd love to be connected! https://t.co/ejexsPd9GB
